summary: Email correspondence between a federal prosecutor from the Southern District of New York and officials from Palm Beach County regarding the process for obtaining grand jury materials from the 2006 Florida state investigation into Jeffrey Epstein for use in the ongoing federal investigation and prosecution of Ghislaine Maxwell. The email includes a signed unsealing order.

persons.name: Guerra, Cindy
persons.role: Chief Operating Officer for Courts and Legal Records and Acting General Counsel for Palm Beach County
persons.context: Palm Beach County official contacted by federal prosecutors to guide them on obtaining grand jury materials from the 2006 Epstein state case.

persons.name: Burstein, Kathy
persons.role: Chief Communications Officer, Executive Clerk & Comptroller for Palm Beach County
persons.context: Initial point of contact for the federal prosecutor; she redirected the request to Cindy Guerra.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.role: Subject of the original state grand jury investigation
persons.context: The federal investigation seeks grand jury materials from his 2006 state prosecution in Palm Beach County.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.role: Subject of the ongoing federal prosecution
persons.context: The federal prosecutor states the requested grand jury materials are relevant to the ongoing investigation and prosecution of Ghislaine Maxwell.

connections.description: The federal prosecutor links the request for Epstein's state grand jury materials directly to the ongoing federal prosecution of Maxwell.
Both are officials within the Palm Beach County Clerk's office, with Guerra handling legal records and Burstein handling communications.

events.title: State Grand Jury Investigation of Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: A grand jury in Palm Beach County, Florida, heard evidence and witness testimony related to the prosecution of Jeffrey Epstein under case number 50-2006-CF-009454 AXX.

events.title: Issuance of Federal Unsealing Order
events.description: A federal judge signed an order to unseal the 2006 Florida state grand jury materials for the federal investigation.

events.title: Federal Request for State Grand Jury Materials
events.description: Federal prosecutors from the Southern District of New York correspond with Palm Beach County officials to obtain transcripts and records from the 2006 Epstein grand jury.

locations: 15th Judicial Circuit, Palm Beach County, Florida
keyFacts: Federal prosecutors were actively seeking evidence from Jeffrey Epstein's 2006 Florida state grand jury proceedings in October 2020 for use in the Ghislaine Maxwell case.
The request process involved obtaining a signed unsealing order from a federal judge, which was attached to the email on October 23, 2020.
The federal investigation into Epstein and prosecution of Maxwell was ongoing as of October 2020.
The correspondence reveals procedural coordination between federal (SDNY) and state (Palm Beach County) legal systems to access sealed grand jury materials.
